name: nextcloud-office
description: Nextcloud Richdocuments integrates Collabora Online to enable collaborative editing of documents, spreadsheets, and presentations directly within a self-hosted Nextcloud environment.
features: Document editing: Create and edit text documents with formatting, styles, and templates.
Spreadsheet support: Work with formulas, charts, and data analysis in spreadsheet files.
Presentation creation: Build slideshows with transitions, animations, and multimedia content.
Real-time collaboration: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously with live cursors and changes.
Format compatibility: Open and save files in Microsoft Office formats including DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX.
Version control: Track document changes and restore previous versions from history.
Comments and review: Add comments, suggestions, and track changes for collaborative editing.
Template library: Start documents from pre-built templates for common use cases.
Mobile editing: Edit documents from mobile devices with responsive interface.
Offline editing: Work on documents without internet and sync changes when reconnected.
Nextcloud integration: Access documents directly from Nextcloud Files with unified permissions.
Privacy-focused: All editing happens on your server with no data sent to third parties.
